name: ts-stream
description: Type-safe object streams with seamless support for backpressure, ending, and error handling

scripts.test: npm run -s lint && npm run -s build && npm run -s mocha
scripts.cover: npm run -s build && nyc npm -s run mocha
scripts.lint: tslint --format verbose -p src/lib && tslint --format verbose -p src/test/ && tslint --format verbose -p src/examples/ && prettier --check 'src/{lib,test,examples}/*.ts' '*.json' '*.yml' '.vscode/*.json'
scripts.build: tsc -p src/lib/ && tsc -p src/test/ && tsc -p src/examples

author: Martin Poelstra <martin@beryllium.net>
